nodes.text: The Scohar Xenohealth Institute was a contagious-diseases research center located in Storinal's capital city, Scohar. Its disease containment vault contained a plasma bomb large enough to incinerate the building and much of the surrounding area if its containment fields were breached. Wraith Squadron successfully infiltrated the Xenohealth Institute in order to obtain a sample of Bunkurd Sewer Disorder for use in a covert operation.
